name: Guinea Pig
description:
This game was made for the #LOWERZJAM 2017.

In this platformer use your grapnel to pass through the 8 levels.

CONTROLS :

Space : Use grapnel

Directionnal Arrow : movement

If you see bugs, or if you like the game, feel free to comment !

The last days were very exhaustive, let me know if it was worth it :) 

Credits :

Dev : Me (FlavienM) and GuillaumeZ

Music : EricSkiff
